DOC.brief_title: Changes Insulin Resistance Healthy Volunteers STRIBILD® Medication
DOC.detailed_description: The measurement insulin resistance perform 30 HIV-negative healthy non-obese ( BMI 18-25 ) male volunteer 14 day ( +/- 2 day ) treatment STRIBILD® ( treatment 1 , n=10 ) , compare TVD , LPV/r ( treatment 2 , n=10 ) TVD , DRV/r ( treatment 3 , n=10 ) . The volunteer randomly assign one three group . The measurement insulin resistance , lipid glucose metabolism perform ; immediately treatment . Furthermore , therapy compliance verify use method drug count therapeutic drug monitoring ( TDM ) .
